name: Creamy Morel Mushroom Grits
author: Sarah Dipity
summary: This is my favorite way to eat grits! Simple and delicious grits flavored with sauteed mushrooms and Parmesan cheese.
ingredients: 4  dried morel mushrooms, or more to taste
directions: Place grits in a bowl with water to cover
Set aside to soak, 8 hours to overnight
Skim any debris that floats to top, rinse well, and drain
Bring broth to a boil in a saucepan; remove from heat
Add mushrooms and soak until soft, about 30 minutes
Bring reserved broth and milk to a boil in saucepan over high heat
Stir grits in gradually, add mushrooms, and decrease heat to low
Cover and cook, stirring occasionally, until grits are soft and creamy, 40 to 50 minutes
Stir in Parmesan cheese until melted
